## LabelFlyoutInflater.load() method

Inflates a flyout label from the given state and adds it to the flyout.

**Signature:**

```typescript
load(state: object, flyout: IFlyout): FlyoutItem;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  state | object | A JSON representation of a flyout label. |
|  flyout | [IFlyout](./blockly.iflyout_interface.md) | The flyout to create the label on. |

**Returns:**

[FlyoutItem](./blockly.flyoutitem_class.md)

A FlyoutButton configured as a label.
